content: 1 Peter､ an apostle of Jesus Christ Unto the chosen pilgrims of the dispersion, throughout Pontus､ Galatia､ Cappadocia､ Asia and Bithynia,—
content_old: 1 Peter､ an apostle of Jesus Christ Unto the chosen pilgrims of the dispersion, throughout Pontus､ Galatia､ Cappadocia､ Asia and Bithynia,—

content: 2 Chosen according to the fore-knowledge of God the Father, In sanctification of Spirit, Unto obedience and the sprinkling of the blood of Jesus Christ Favour unto you､ and peace､ be multiplied!
content_old: 2 Chosen according to the fore-knowledge of God the Father, In sanctification of Spirit, Unto obedience and the sprinkling of the blood of Jesus Christ Favour unto you､ and peace､ be multiplied!

content: 3 Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, Who according to his great mercy Hath regenerated us unto a living hope, Through the resurrection of Jesus Christ from among the dead,
content_old: 3 Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, Who according to his great mercy Hath regenerated us unto a living hope, Through the resurrection of Jesus Christ from among the dead,

content: 4 Unto an inheritance､ incorruptible and undefiled and unfading､ Reserved in the heavens for you
content_old: 4 Unto an inheritance､ incorruptible and undefiled and unfading､ Reserved in the heavens for you

content: 5 who in God’s power are being guarded through faith unto salvation— Ready to be revealed in the last ripe time:
content_old: 5 who in God’s power are being guarded through faith unto salvation— Ready to be revealed in the last ripe time:

content: 6 Wherein ye exult, Though､ for a little､ just now､ if needful､ put to grief in manifold temptations,
content_old: 6 Wherein ye exult, Though､ for a little､ just now､ if needful､ put to grief in manifold temptations,

content: 7 In order that the proving of your faith— Much more precious than of gold that perisheth even though by means of fire it is proved— May be found unto praise and glory and honour in the revealing of Jesus Christ,—
content_old: 7 In order that the proving of your faith— Much more precious than of gold that perisheth even though by means of fire it is proved— May be found unto praise and glory and honour in the revealing of Jesus Christ,—

content: 8 Whom not having seen ye love, On whom though at present not looking､ but believing ye exult with joy unspeakable and filled with glory､
content_old: 8 Whom not having seen ye love, On whom though at present not looking､ but believing ye exult with joy unspeakable and filled with glory､

content: 9 Being about to bear away the end of your faith—a salvation of souls:
content_old: 9 Being about to bear away the end of your faith—a salvation of souls:

content: 10 Concerning which salvation Prophets—who concerning the favour for you did prophesy—sought out and searched out,
content_old: 10 Concerning which salvation Prophets—who concerning the favour for you did prophesy—sought out and searched out,

content: 11 Searching into what particular or what manner of season the Spirit of Christ which was in them was pointing to､ when witnessing beforehand as to— The sufferings for Christ､ And the glories after these,—
content_old: 11 Searching into what particular or what manner of season the Spirit of Christ which was in them was pointing to､ when witnessing beforehand as to— The sufferings for Christ､ And the glories after these,—

content: 12 Unto whom it was revealed—that､ Not unto themselves､ But unto us they were ministering them, Which things have now been announced unto you through them who have told you the good tidings with Holy Spirit sent forth from heaven: Into which things messengers are coveting to obtain a nearer view.
content_old: 12 Unto whom it was revealed—that､ Not unto themselves､ But unto us they were ministering them, Which things have now been announced unto you through them who have told you the good tidings with Holy Spirit sent forth from heaven: Into which things messengers are coveting to obtain a nearer view.

content: 13 Wherefore girding up the loins of your mind Keeping sober Perseveringly direct your hope unto the favour being borne along to you in the revealing of Jesus Christ:
content_old: 13 Wherefore girding up the loins of your mind Keeping sober Perseveringly direct your hope unto the favour being borne along to you in the revealing of Jesus Christ:

content: 14 As obedient persons not configuring yourselves unto your former covetings in your ignorance:
content_old: 14 As obedient persons not configuring yourselves unto your former covetings in your ignorance:

content: 15 But according as he that hath called you is holy do ye yourselves also become holy in all manner of behaviour,—
content_old: 15 But according as he that hath called you is holy do ye yourselves also become holy in all manner of behaviour,—

content: 16 Inasmuch as it is written— Holy shall ye be, Because I am holy.
content_old: 16 Inasmuch as it is written— Holy shall ye be, Because I am holy.

content: 17 And if as Father ye are invoking him who without respect of persons judgeth according to each man’s work With reverence､ for the time of your sojourning behave ye;
content_old: 17 And if as Father ye are invoking him who without respect of persons judgeth according to each man’s work With reverence､ for the time of your sojourning behave ye;

content: 18 Knowing that Not with corruptible things､ with silver or gold have ye been redeemed from your unmeaning behaviour paternally handed down,
content_old: 18 Knowing that Not with corruptible things､ with silver or gold have ye been redeemed from your unmeaning behaviour paternally handed down,

content: 19 But with precious blood as of a lamb､ unblemished and unspotted of an Anointed One,—
content_old: 19 But with precious blood as of a lamb､ unblemished and unspotted of an Anointed One,—

content: 20 Foreknown､ indeed､ before the foundation of the world, But made manifest at a last stage of the times､ for the sake of you
content_old: 20 Foreknown､ indeed､ before the foundation of the world, But made manifest at a last stage of the times､ for the sake of you

content: 21 who through him are faithful towards God,—Who raised him from among the dead､ and glory to him gave, So that your faith and hope are directed towards God:
content_old: 21 who through him are faithful towards God,—Who raised him from among the dead､ and glory to him gave, So that your faith and hope are directed towards God:

content: 22 Having purified yours souls by the obedience of the truth､ unto unfeigned brotherly affection From the heart love one another earnestly;
content_old: 22 Having purified yours souls by the obedience of the truth､ unto unfeigned brotherly affection From the heart love one another earnestly;

content: 23 Having been regenerated— Not out of corruptible seed､ But incorruptible— Through means of the word of a Living and Abiding God;
content_old: 23 Having been regenerated— Not out of corruptible seed､ But incorruptible— Through means of the word of a Living and Abiding God;

content: 24 Inasmuch as— All flesh is as grass, And all the glory thereof as the flower of grass,— The grass hath withered､ And the flower hath fallen out,
content_old: 24 Inasmuch as— All flesh is as grass, And all the glory thereof as the flower of grass,— The grass hath withered､ And the flower hath fallen out,

content: 1 Putting away､ therefore､ all vice and all deceit and hypocrisy and envyings and all detractions
content_old: 1 Putting away､ therefore､ all vice and all deceit and hypocrisy and envyings and all detractions

content: 2 As new-born babes for the pure milk that is for the mind eagerly crave, That thereby ye may grow unto salvation:—
content_old: 2 As new-born babes for the pure milk that is for the mind eagerly crave, That thereby ye may grow unto salvation:—

content: 3 If ye have tasted for yourselves that gracious is the Lord,—
content_old: 3 If ye have tasted for yourselves that gracious is the Lord,—

content: 4 Unto whom coming near､ as unto a living stone— By men indeed､ rejected, But with God chosen､ held in honour
content_old: 4 Unto whom coming near､ as unto a living stone— By men indeed､ rejected, But with God chosen､ held in honour

content: 5 Yourselves also as living stones are being built up a spiritual house､ for a holy priesthood, To offer spiritual sacrifices､ well-pleasing unto God through Jesus Christ;
content_old: 5 Yourselves also as living stones are being built up a spiritual house､ for a holy priesthood, To offer spiritual sacrifices､ well-pleasing unto God through Jesus Christ;

content: 6 Inasmuch as it is contained in scripture— Lo! I lay in Zion an outmost corner stone､ chosen､ held in honour, And he that resteth faith thereupon shall not be put to shame.
content_old: 6 Inasmuch as it is contained in scripture— Lo! I lay in Zion an outmost corner stone､ chosen､ held in honour, And he that resteth faith thereupon shall not be put to shame.

content: 7 Unto you､ then､ is the honour—unto you who believe; But unto such as disbelieve, The stone which the builders rejected— The same hath become head of the corner,
content_old: 7 Unto you､ then､ is the honour—unto you who believe; But unto such as disbelieve, The stone which the builders rejected— The same hath become head of the corner,

content: 8 And a stone to strike against､ And a rock to stumble over: Who stumble because unto the word they do not yield,— Unto which also they have been appointed;
content_old: 8 And a stone to strike against､ And a rock to stumble over: Who stumble because unto the word they do not yield,— Unto which also they have been appointed;

content: 9 But ye are a chosen race､ a royal priesthood､ a holy nation､ a people for a peculiar treasure, That the excellences ye may tell forth､ of him who out of darkness hath called you into his marvellous light:—
content_old: 9 But ye are a chosen race､ a royal priesthood､ a holy nation､ a people for a peculiar treasure, That the excellences ye may tell forth､ of him who out of darkness hath called you into his marvellous light:—

content: 10 Who at one time were a No-people, But now are a people of God,— Who had not been enjoying mercy, But now have received mercy.
content_old: 10 Who at one time were a No-people, But now are a people of God,— Who had not been enjoying mercy, But now have received mercy.

content: 11 Beloved! I exhort you as sojourners and pilgrims To abstain from fleshly covetings､ Such as take the field against the soul;
content_old: 11 Beloved! I exhort you as sojourners and pilgrims To abstain from fleshly covetings､ Such as take the field against the soul;

content: 12 Having your behaviour among the nations honourable,— In order that wherein they speak against you as evil-doers they may owing to the honourable works they are permitted to behold glorify God in the day of visitation.
content_old: 12 Having your behaviour among the nations honourable,— In order that wherein they speak against you as evil-doers they may owing to the honourable works they are permitted to behold glorify God in the day of visitation.

content: 13 Submit yourselves unto every human creation､ for the Lord’s sake,— Whether unto a king､ as one that protecteth,
content_old: 13 Submit yourselves unto every human creation､ for the Lord’s sake,— Whether unto a king､ as one that protecteth,

content: 14 Or unto governors､ as through him sent— For vengeance on evil-doers､ But praise to such as do good;
content_old: 14 Or unto governors､ as through him sent— For vengeance on evil-doers､ But praise to such as do good;

content: 15 Because so is the will of God,—by doing good to be putting to silence the ignorance of heedless men:
content_old: 15 Because so is the will of God,—by doing good to be putting to silence the ignorance of heedless men:

content: 16 As free, Yet not as a cloak of vice holding your freedom, But as God’s servants.
content_old: 16 As free, Yet not as a cloak of vice holding your freedom, But as God’s servants.

content: 17 Unto all men give honour, Unto the brotherhood shew love, Unto God give reverence, The king hold in honour.
content_old: 17 Unto all men give honour, Unto the brotherhood shew love, Unto God give reverence, The king hold in honour.

content: 18 Ye domestics submitting yourselves､ in all reverence､ unto your masters,— Not only unto the good and considerate､ But also unto the perverse;
content_old: 18 Ye domestics submitting yourselves､ in all reverence､ unto your masters,— Not only unto the good and considerate､ But also unto the perverse;

content: 19 For this is thank worthy,—If for the sake of conscience towards God one beareth griefs suffering wrongfully,—
content_old: 19 For this is thank worthy,—If for the sake of conscience towards God one beareth griefs suffering wrongfully,—

content: 20 For what sort of honour is it—If committing sin and being buffeted ye endure it? But if doing good and suffering､ ye endure it This is thankworthy with God.
content_old: 20 For what sort of honour is it—If committing sin and being buffeted ye endure it? But if doing good and suffering､ ye endure it This is thankworthy with God.

content: 21 For hereunto have ye been called; Because Christ also suffered in your behalf, Unto you leaving behind a pattern､ That ye might follow in his steps:
content_old: 21 For hereunto have ye been called; Because Christ also suffered in your behalf, Unto you leaving behind a pattern､ That ye might follow in his steps:

content: 22 Who did not a sin commit, Neither was deceit found in his mouth,—
content_old: 22 Who did not a sin commit, Neither was deceit found in his mouth,—

content: 23 Who being reviled was not reviling again, Suffering he was not threatening､ But was making surrender unto him that judgeth righteously,—
content_old: 23 Who being reviled was not reviling again, Suffering he was not threatening､ But was making surrender unto him that judgeth righteously,—

content: 24 Who our sins himself bare up､ in his body､ unto the tree, In order that we from our sins getting away In righteousness might live,— By whose stripes ye have been healed;
content_old: 24 Who our sins himself bare up､ in his body､ unto the tree, In order that we from our sins getting away In righteousness might live,— By whose stripes ye have been healed;

content: 1 In like manner ye wives—submitting yourselves unto your own husbands; In order that if any are not yielding unto the word Through their wives’ behaviour they may without the word be won,
content_old: 1 In like manner ye wives—submitting yourselves unto your own husbands; In order that if any are not yielding unto the word Through their wives’ behaviour they may without the word be won,

content: 2 Having been permitted to behold your reverently chaste behaviour,—
content_old: 2 Having been permitted to behold your reverently chaste behaviour,—

content: 3 Whose adorning let it be— Not the outward of plaiting the hair and wearing golden ornaments､ or putting on of apparel
content_old: 3 Whose adorning let it be— Not the outward of plaiting the hair and wearing golden ornaments､ or putting on of apparel

content: 4 But the hidden character of the heart—In the incorruptible ornament of the quiet and meek spirit､ which is in presence of God of great price.
content_old: 4 But the hidden character of the heart—In the incorruptible ornament of the quiet and meek spirit､ which is in presence of God of great price.

content: 5 For so at one time the holy women also､ who directed their hope towards God used to adorn themselves being in submission unto their own husbands:
content_old: 5 For so at one time the holy women also､ who directed their hope towards God used to adorn themselves being in submission unto their own husbands:

content: 6 As Sarah was obedient unto Abraham､ calling him lord,— Whoso children ye have become—so long as ye are doing good､ and not bringing yourselves into fear of any single cause of alarm.
content_old: 6 As Sarah was obedient unto Abraham､ calling him lord,— Whoso children ye have become—so long as ye are doing good､ and not bringing yourselves into fear of any single cause of alarm.

content: 7 Ye husbands in like manner dwelling with them according to knowledge,— As unto a weaker vessel unto the female vessel assigning honour, As joint-inheritors also of life’s favour,— To the end that unhindered may be your prayers.
content_old: 7 Ye husbands in like manner dwelling with them according to knowledge,— As unto a weaker vessel unto the female vessel assigning honour, As joint-inheritors also of life’s favour,— To the end that unhindered may be your prayers.

content: 8 And finally all being of one mind, having fellow-feeling, attached to the brethren, of tender affection, of lowly mind:
content_old: 8 And finally all being of one mind, having fellow-feeling, attached to the brethren, of tender affection, of lowly mind:

content: 9 Not returning evil for evil､ Nor reviling for reviling, But on the contrary bestowing a blessing,— Because hereunto have ye been called, In order that a blessing ye might inherit.
content_old: 9 Not returning evil for evil､ Nor reviling for reviling, But on the contrary bestowing a blessing,— Because hereunto have ye been called, In order that a blessing ye might inherit.

content: 10 For he that desireth to love life､ And to see good days Let him cause his tongue to cease from mischief, And lips that they speak not deceit;
content_old: 10 For he that desireth to love life､ And to see good days Let him cause his tongue to cease from mischief, And lips that they speak not deceit;

content: 11 Let him turn away from mischiefs､ and do good, Let him seek peace､ and pursue it;
content_old: 11 Let him turn away from mischiefs､ and do good, Let him seek peace､ and pursue it;

content: 12 Because the eyes of the Lord are towards the righteous, And his ears､ unto their supplication,— Whereas the face of the Lord is against them that are doing mischievous things.
content_old: 12 Because the eyes of the Lord are towards the righteous, And his ears､ unto their supplication,— Whereas the face of the Lord is against them that are doing mischievous things.

content: 13 Who､ then､ is he that shall harm you､ if for that which is good ye become zealous?
content_old: 13 Who､ then､ is he that shall harm you､ if for that which is good ye become zealous?

content: 14 Nevertheless even if ye should suffer for righteousness’ sake happy are ye! Their fear however､ do not fear､ neither be troubled;
content_old: 14 Nevertheless even if ye should suffer for righteousness’ sake happy are ye! Their fear however､ do not fear､ neither be troubled;

content: 15 But the Lord Christ hallow ye in your hearts, Ready always for a defence､ unto every one that is asking you a reason concerning the hope within you,— Nevertheless､ with meekness and reverence:
content_old: 15 But the Lord Christ hallow ye in your hearts, Ready always for a defence､ unto every one that is asking you a reason concerning the hope within you,— Nevertheless､ with meekness and reverence:

content: 16 Having a good conscience, In order that Wherein they speak against you they may be put to shame who cast wanton insult on your good behaviour in Christ.
content_old: 16 Having a good conscience, In order that Wherein they speak against you they may be put to shame who cast wanton insult on your good behaviour in Christ.

content: 17 For it is better､ as well-doers if it should please the pleasure of God to be suffering, than as evil-doers:
content_old: 17 For it is better､ as well-doers if it should please the pleasure of God to be suffering, than as evil-doers:

content: 18 Because Christ also once for all､ concerning sins died,— Just in behalf of unjust,—In order that he might introduce us unto God; Being put to death､ indeed､ in flesh, But made alive in spirit,—
content_old: 18 Because Christ also once for all､ concerning sins died,— Just in behalf of unjust,—In order that he might introduce us unto God; Being put to death､ indeed､ in flesh, But made alive in spirit,—

content: 19 In which even unto the spirits in prison he went and proclaimed,—
content_old: 19 In which even unto the spirits in prison he went and proclaimed,—

content: 20 Spirits unyielding at one time, When the longsuffering of God was holding forth a welcome in the days of Noah､ There being in preparation an ark— Going into which a few､ that is eight､ souls were brought safely through by means of water,—
content_old: 20 Spirits unyielding at one time, When the longsuffering of God was holding forth a welcome in the days of Noah､ There being in preparation an ark— Going into which a few､ that is eight､ souls were brought safely through by means of water,—

content: 21 Which water in manner corresponding doth now save you also—even immersion,—Not a putting away of the filth of the flesh､ But the request unto God for a good conscience､ Through the resurrection of Jesus Christ,—
content_old: 21 Which water in manner corresponding doth now save you also—even immersion,—Not a putting away of the filth of the flesh､ But the request unto God for a good conscience､ Through the resurrection of Jesus Christ,—

content: 1 Christ then､ having suffered in flesh Do ye also with the same purpose arm yourselves,— Because he that hath suffered in flesh hath done with sins,—
content_old: 1 Christ then､ having suffered in flesh Do ye also with the same purpose arm yourselves,— Because he that hath suffered in flesh hath done with sins,—

content: 2 To the end that no longer､ in men’s covetings､ but in God’s will ye may live the still remaining time.
content_old: 2 To the end that no longer､ in men’s covetings､ but in God’s will ye may live the still remaining time.

content: 3 For sufficient is the by gone time—to have wrought out the will of the nations, Having gone on in wanton ways､ covetings､ wine-drinkings､ revellings､ drinking-bouts､ and impious idolatries:—
content_old: 3 For sufficient is the by gone time—to have wrought out the will of the nations, Having gone on in wanton ways､ covetings､ wine-drinkings､ revellings､ drinking-bouts､ and impious idolatries:—

content: 4 Wherein they are taken by surprise that ye run not with them into the same overflow of riotous excess,—uttering defamation:
content_old: 4 Wherein they are taken by surprise that ye run not with them into the same overflow of riotous excess,—uttering defamation:

content: 5 Who shall render an account unto him who is holding in readiness to judge living and dead;
content_old: 5 Who shall render an account unto him who is holding in readiness to judge living and dead;

content: 6 For unto this end even unto the dead was the glad-message delivered,— In order that they might be judged､ indeed､ according to men in flesh, But might live according to God in spirit.
content_old: 6 For unto this end even unto the dead was the glad-message delivered,— In order that they might be judged､ indeed､ according to men in flesh, But might live according to God in spirit.

content: 7 But the end of all things hath drawn near:— Be of sound mind､ therefore､ and be sober for prayers;
content_old: 7 But the end of all things hath drawn near:— Be of sound mind､ therefore､ and be sober for prayers;

content: 8 Before all things keeping fervent your love among yourselves, Because love covereth a multitude of sins;
content_old: 8 Before all things keeping fervent your love among yourselves, Because love covereth a multitude of sins;

content: 9 Shewing hospitality one to another without murmuring,—
content_old: 9 Shewing hospitality one to another without murmuring,—

content: 10 Each one according as he hath received a gift of favour unto one another ministering the same, As careful stewards of the manifold favour of God:
content_old: 10 Each one according as he hath received a gift of favour unto one another ministering the same, As careful stewards of the manifold favour of God:

content: 11 If any one speaketh as oracles of God, If any one ministereth as of strength which God supplieth,— That in all things God may be glorified through Jesus Christ,— Unto whom are the glory and the dominion､ unto the ages of ages. Amen!
content_old: 11 If any one speaketh as oracles of God, If any one ministereth as of strength which God supplieth,— That in all things God may be glorified through Jesus Christ,— Unto whom are the glory and the dominion､ unto the ages of ages. Amen!

content: 12 Beloved! be not held in surprise by the burning among you､ which for putting you to the proof is befalling you､ As though a surprising thing were happening unto you;
content_old: 12 Beloved! be not held in surprise by the burning among you､ which for putting you to the proof is befalling you､ As though a surprising thing were happening unto you;

content: 13 But in so far as ye are taking fellowship in the Christ’s sufferings rejoice! In order that in the revealing of his glory also ye may rejoice with exultation:
content_old: 13 But in so far as ye are taking fellowship in the Christ’s sufferings rejoice! In order that in the revealing of his glory also ye may rejoice with exultation:

content: 14 If ye are being reproached in the name of Christ happy are ye! Because the Spirit of the glory and the Spirit of God unto you is bringing rest.
content_old: 14 If ye are being reproached in the name of Christ happy are ye! Because the Spirit of the glory and the Spirit of God unto you is bringing rest.

content: 15 For let none of you be suffering as a murderer､ or a thief､ or an evil-doer､ or as one prying into other men’s affairs;
content_old: 15 For let none of you be suffering as a murderer､ or a thief､ or an evil-doer､ or as one prying into other men’s affairs;

content: 16 But if as a Christian let him not be ashamed, but be glorifying God in this name.
content_old: 16 But if as a Christian let him not be ashamed, but be glorifying God in this name.

content: 17 For it is the ripe time for the judgment to begin with the house of God; But if first with us what shall be the end of them who yield not unto the glad-message of God?
content_old: 17 For it is the ripe time for the judgment to begin with the house of God; But if first with us what shall be the end of them who yield not unto the glad-message of God?

content: 18 And if the righteous man is with difficulty saved Where then shall the ungodly and sinful man appear?
content_old: 18 And if the righteous man is with difficulty saved Where then shall the ungodly and sinful man appear?

content: 1 Elders､ therefore､ among you I exhort— I who am their co-elder and a witness of the sufferings of the Christ, Who also in the glory about to be revealed have a share;—
content_old: 1 Elders､ therefore､ among you I exhort— I who am their co-elder and a witness of the sufferings of the Christ, Who also in the glory about to be revealed have a share;—

content: 2 Shepherd the beloved flock of God which is among you,— Not by compulsion､ but by choice, Nor yet for base gain､ but of a ready mind,—
content_old: 2 Shepherd the beloved flock of God which is among you,— Not by compulsion､ but by choice, Nor yet for base gain､ but of a ready mind,—

content: 3 Nor yet as lording it over the allotted portions､ but becoming ensamples to the beloved flock;
content_old: 3 Nor yet as lording it over the allotted portions､ but becoming ensamples to the beloved flock;

content: 4 And when the Chief Shepherd is manifested Ye shall bear away the unfading crown of glory.
content_old: 4 And when the Chief Shepherd is manifested Ye shall bear away the unfading crown of glory.

content: 5 In like manner ye younger men—submit yourselves unto elders;— All､ however､ one towards another gird on humility; Because God against the haughty arrayeth himself, Whereas unto the lowly he giveth favour.
content_old: 5 In like manner ye younger men—submit yourselves unto elders;— All､ however､ one towards another gird on humility; Because God against the haughty arrayeth himself, Whereas unto the lowly he giveth favour.

content: 6 Be made lowly､ therefore､ under the strong hand of God, That he may lift you up in due time,—
content_old: 6 Be made lowly､ therefore､ under the strong hand of God, That he may lift you up in due time,—

content: 7 All your anxiety casting upon him, Because he careth for you.
content_old: 7 All your anxiety casting upon him, Because he careth for you.

content: 8 Be sober! be watchful! Your slanderous adversary as a roaring lion is walking about—seeking to devour:
content_old: 8 Be sober! be watchful! Your slanderous adversary as a roaring lion is walking about—seeking to devour:

content: 9 Whom resist､ steadfast in your faith, Knowing that the same sufferings in your brotherhood that is in the world are being accomplished.
content_old: 9 Whom resist､ steadfast in your faith, Knowing that the same sufferings in your brotherhood that is in the world are being accomplished.

content: 10 Howbeit the God of all favour— Who hath called you unto his age-abiding glory in Christ— When for a little ye have suffered Himself will adjust､ confirm､ strengthen:—
content_old: 10 Howbeit the God of all favour— Who hath called you unto his age-abiding glory in Christ— When for a little ye have suffered Himself will adjust､ confirm､ strengthen:—

content: 11 Unto him be the dominion､ unto the ages. Amen!
content_old: 11 Unto him be the dominion､ unto the ages. Amen!

content: 12 By Silvanus the faithful brother､ as I account him､ Have I briefly written unto you, Exhorting and adding testimony—That this is the true favour of God,—Within which､ stand ye fast!
content_old: 12 By Silvanus the faithful brother､ as I account him､ Have I briefly written unto you, Exhorting and adding testimony—That this is the true favour of God,—Within which､ stand ye fast!

content: 13 She who in Babylon is co-elect､ and Mark my son､ salute you:
content_old: 13 She who in Babylon is co-elect､ and Mark my son､ salute you:
